name: Alio IT Solutions
about:
We are a Software Development Boutique with presence in the United States, Mexico, India and South America focusing on developing innovative technology. We help companies bridge the gap between people, process and platform so it is all tightly knit and working towards the same company goals. In our core think about how new technology like AI/ML, Blockchain and overall Software Engineering among others can help bring your company to the next level and exceed customer expectations.

Web3
EdTech
Digital Manufacturing
Open Source Development (REACT.js, NODE.js, Angular.js, React Native)
DevOps (AWS)
Project Management Services
Application maintenance and support services
Cloud software development (.NET and Open Source) services
Salesforce

We strive in a collaborative environment where change is a given and part of our DNA, we are adaptive to change (AGILE) and results oriented.
